results.title: METformin for the MINimization of Geographic Atrophy Progression (METforMIN): A Randomized Trial
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@METformin@@@ for the MINimization of @<m>DISEASE_Geographic_Atrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D057092 @@@Geographic Atrophy@@@ Progression (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@METforMIN@@@): A Randomized Trial

results.title: Metformin and the Development of Age-Related Macular Degeneration.
results.text_hl: Objective: To evaluate the association of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ with the development of any @DISEASE_Macular_Degeneration @DISEASE_MESH:D008268 @@@AMD@@@ and progression to @<m>DISEASE_Geographic_Atrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D057092 @@@geographic atrophy@@@ and @DISEASE_Macular_Degeneration @DISEASE_MESH:D008268 @@@neovascular AMD@@@ using a large electronic health record (EHR) platform.

citations.NLM: Jindal DA, Hanna J, Shaia JK, Markle J, Rachitskaya A, Kaelber DC, Singh RP, Talcott KE. Metformin and the Development of Age-Related Macular Degeneration. JAMA Ophthalmol. 2025 Sep 18;():. PMID: 40965862
